title: PK24 Chair
body: Considered one of the most stunning designs of the mid-century era, the PK24 Chair was Poul Kjærholm's first adjustable lounge chair. The sitting position of PK24 is capable of adjustment and specifically designed to do so using gravity. Inspiration for this chair comes from the Rococo period and the French chaise lounge - long chair - that featured the same curve and size.
